<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Acute Scent](/Feats.aspx?ID=135) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 88 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Acute Vision](/Feats.aspx?ID=130) or [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415)

</column>

---

When you Rage, your sense of smell improves. You gain imprecise scent with a range of 30 feet.

<title level="2">Acute Scent leads to...</title>
[Instinctive Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1616), [Nocturnal Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=1611), [Supernatural Senses](/Feats.aspx?ID=1608)
name: Acute Scent
